full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
#### [English]
**W6893-22S020, Portable Chemical Toilets for DND, St-Jean Garrison**

#### [French]
**W6893-22S020, OCIR toilettes chimiques portatives MDN, Garnison St-Jean**

* **Reference Number:** WS3857093124-Doc3949233433
* **Publication Date:** 2023-04-03
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-03T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery:** Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
* **Contracting Entity:**
	+ Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity:**
	+ Department of National Defence (DND)
	+ 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Lisa-Marie Julien, SPAC/PSPC
	+ lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposal submissions for the rental, delivery, installation, and maintenance of portable chemical toilets and emptying of wastewater collection tanks and wastewater holding tanks in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu and Farnham. The requirements, as detailed in Annex A, are part of the REQUEST
